scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:scss && npm run copy-assets
scripts.compile:scss: sass src/main.scss src/main.css -I ./node_modules -c --no-source-map && npm run filesize -- src/main.css
scripts.minify:scss: postcss src/main.css -o dist/main.css && npm run filesize -- dist/main.css
scripts.build:scss: npm run compile:scss && npm run minify:scss
scripts.build:html: html-minifier src/index.html -o dist/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctypei && npm run filesize -- dist/index.html
scripts.test-purgecss: npm run compile:scss && purgecss --css src/main.css --content src/index.html
